tswitem.name: Signet of Recuperation
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Recuperation
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you apply a heal over time effect to an ally, you have a 33%/66%/100% chance to apply a beneficial effect to that ally which lasts for 4 seconds. When this effect expires, that ally regains health equal to 7,5%/15%/22,5% of the damage they received while the effect was active. This effect cannot be applied more than once every 15 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
